name: 廖昭文
objective: 本課程設計重點有三：(1)藉由精選的中級程度教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week 1: Course introduction  When Disaster Strike Week 2: When Disaster Strike Week 3: Superstorm Week 4: Superstorm Week 5: Underwater Wonders; Water: A global View Week 6: Marco Polo in China Week 7: Marco Polo in China  Week 8: The Travels of Ibn Battuta  Week 9: Midterm exam  Week 10: A Warming World Week 11: A Warming World Week 12: Arctic Survivors Week 13: Arctic Survivors Week 14: To the Edge of Space Week 15: To the Edge of Space Week 16: Dark Descent Week 17: The Grand Canyon; Climate: A global View
Week 18 Final Exam
scorePolicy:
Attendance, quizzes, assignments       30%
Midterm exam                           30%
Final exam                             40%
materials: Reading Explorer 2, MacIntyre, P, Heinle, Cengage Learning, 2009
